description: **Deprecated**: .NET Core 3.0 is not supported anymore. There is now a single package `sonarscanner-net`, for *.NET Core 3.1* and *.NET 5.0* and above.
summary: [Deprecated] The SonarScanner for MSBuild allows easy analysis of any .NET project with SonarCloud/SonarQube.
